ch.nolix.element.basic

Class ClassableNamableElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.element.basic.Element
      • ch.nolix.element.basic.NamableElement
        • ch.nolix.element.basic.ClassableNamableElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IController, IControlleroid, Classable, DeterminedSIMPLE_CLASS_NAMEd, Namable, Specifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Rectangle

    public abstract class ClassableNamableElement
extends NamableElement
implements Classable
    A classable namable element is a namable element that can have a class.
